code: import{useContext}from"react";import VideoFlipperContext from"../context";import'./index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Preview=()=>{const{aspectRatio,previewCanvasRef,showCropper}=useContext(VideoFlipperContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"preview-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"preview-heading",children:"Preview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`preview ${showCropper&&'preview-cropper'}`,style:{aspectRatio:aspectRatio,overflow:'hidden'},children:showCropper?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:previewCanvasRef}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"placeholder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:"Preview not available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtext",children:"Please click on \"Start Cropper\" and then play video"})]})})]});};export default Preview;
